name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open haiku reader”
”Alexa, launch haiku reader”
”Alexa, begin haiku reader”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Discover the timeless beauty of traditional Haiku poems with the Haiku Reader skill. This skill offers a serene escape into the world of Haiku, a classic form of Japanese poetry known for its simplicity and depth. Whether you seek a moment of reflection, inspiration, or just a brief respite from your day, Haiku Reader delivers a curated selection of Haiku poems that capture the essence of nature and the human experience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
